incentives.description: Main Force Patrol Cadet: Show your support and get your MFP badge!

unique.name: Digital Main Force Patrol Badge
unique.description: A personalizable and customizable digital badge. Show it off on your profile and embed it in fansites and forums.

unique.name: Campaign Updates
unique.description: Receive updates feed on the campaign's progress.

incentives.description: Main Force Patrol Officer: Gain access to all the unlocked rewards and also the production blog.

unique.name: Production Blog
unique.description: Access to a twice-weekly update from the production team, with contributions from the actors, directors and other members of the film crew.

unique.name: Unlocked Rewards
unique.description: Receive all the currently unlocked rewards as well as any unlocked before the campaign ends.

incentives.description: Thunderdome Champion: All the perks of Contributor Level, plus exclusive production extras

unique.name: Digital Movie Download
unique.description: Download-to-own digital version of Mad Max: Fury Road, available the day it is released.

unique.name: Download From The Original Trilogy
unique.description: Download-to-own digital version of one of the remastered films from the original trilogy. Select your desired film at checkout.

incentives.description: Road Warrior: Every perk from before + tangible goods.

unique.name: Ticket Pre-order
unique.description: Ticket vouchers will be sent to you within a week. Two weeks before the movie premieres, you can exchange it for a cinema ticket at your most convenient theater location. Your seat is always guaranteed!

unique.name: Exclusive MFP Jacket
unique.description: Standard Issue Main Officer Patrol Jacket.
